scripts.start: sam local invoke --profile shopint --region eu-central-1 -e event.json getIp
scripts.package: sam package --template-file template.json --profile shopint --s3-bucket shopint-functions --output-template-file packaged.json
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --profile shopint --region eu-central-1 --template-file packaged.json --stack-name getIp --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.publish: npm run package && npm run deploy
